nodes.text: The Royal Alderaanian House Cortess owned an estate in the Kaamos Territory on Alderaan, also referred to as House Cortess. It was the seat of Baron Peyar Cortess and his wife Chay Cortess. Captain Perovius commanded the defenses of the estate around 3643 BBY.
In the Dark Side option in the Imperial Agent storyline the estate is turned into the nesting grounds for Oroboro Killiks. In the Light Side option, Peyar Cortess and most of his house are spared.
